message: This is a fair offer, Bob.  I'm willing to give you a decent share, but we can always negotiate further.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Your turn to negotiate!
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think this is a fair offer considering the inflation.
I'm not giving up yet! I think I deserve more considering the inflation. Your turn to counteroffer!
I'm willing to concede a bit more, but I think this is a fair offer considering how much the money has depreciated. Let's end this negotiation and split the money!
